RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the United States District Court's denia: United States District Court's denial of Ramon De La Cruz's motion to dismiss
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress: Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Speedy Trial Act: governs the timing of trials, including exclusions for certain periods
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Presentence Investigation Report: calculated a Guidelines-sentencing range of 41 to 51 months' imprisonment for Ramon De La Cruz
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that denied Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress and his motion to dismiss the indictment on Speedy Trial Act grounds
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant and transporter of aliens, charged with conspiracy to transport aliens within the United States for commercial advantage or private financial gain, convicted on all three offenses
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.motion to dismiss the indictment: motion filed by Ramon De La Cruz, denied by the United States District Court
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's indictment: indictment against Ramon De La Cruz for alien transportation offenses, including conspiracy to transport aliens within the United States for commercial advantage or private financial gain
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.immigration checkpoint stop: location where Ramon De La Cruz and Zeba Williams were stopped by United States Border Patrol Agents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.search of the tractor-trailer: ensued after the immigration checkpoint stop, was challenged by Ramon De La Cruz as impermissible, subject of Ramon De La Cruz's motions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress: motion filed by Ramon De La Cruz to suppress evidence seized from the immigration checkpoint stop, challenging both the duration of the stop and the ensuing search of the tractor-trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's convictions: convictions of Ramon De La Cruz for smuggling undocumented aliens, being challenged on sufficiency of evidence
